content: summerburst striped baby blanket pattern **this listing is for a pattern only** -no physical item will be shipped *****this pattern is available for free on my website at https //www nautikrallcrochet com/blog-freepatterns/summerburststripedbabyblanket this listing is for those who wish to have an advertisement free pattern or printable copy it s classic it s beautiful it s made with dreamy yarn… while i love the classic navy and white stripe nautical look i also think this blanket would be adorable with a variety of different colours keep the cream coloured base and add a coral colour for a fun and fresh vibe or change out the navy with a subtle green or taupe for a more neutral and soft look or simply replace navy with a soft pink or purple for a stunning baby girl blanket the options are truly endless and the shine worsted yarn used for this blanket has a wide variety of shades suitable to your every need colours i ve got my eye on include clarity pistachio grapefruit blush hydrangea wisteria and platinum made with the softest cotton i could get my hands on… crochet com or knit picks very own shine worsted a blended pima cotton and beech wood fibre modal makes this blanket extra special you won t want to miss this one this pattern is worked up using the classic sunburst granny square and jayg method the pattern uses wecrochet knit picks shine worsted 75yds/50g and a 5mm hook size h pattern includes all colours used and the yarn quantities as well as exact positioning i also include a whole section with clickable links to alternative yarn selections my gift to you is taking the work out of colourwork the final blanket size was approximately 32 x 45 inches pattern will include - yarn amounts/quantities - yarn colours/colour legend - stitch glossary - printable pdf of blanket graph - full colour chart of all squares and their positioning so you can make this exact colour copy - full written instruction for the granny square used sunburst granny square - written and video tutorial for border - video tutorials for the granny square as well as the join as you go method happy crocheting everyone l m
